channel.title: [PI] How to pause? Is it sleep()? or wait()?
channel.description:
How do I pause, so one thing is executed, say 10 seconds, after the sleep() or wait()?
I want to have a message pop up, then an animation play, then the player be teleported, but they are teleported 5 seconds after the animation plays.
Thanks. :)
